sqlMap.select: SELECT D.TITLE, D.CODE_TYP, D.YEAR, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.CREATE_DT,'YYYYMMDD'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.NOTI_DT,'YYYYMMDD'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') NOTI_DT,D.EXEC_CNT, F.ORG_FILE_NM FROM T_DECAY D LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FILE F ON D.SEQ_DECAY = F.TABLE_SEQ AND F.TABC_TYP = 'DE' AND F.RECODE_ST='A' WHERE D.SEQ_DECAY=#seq#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_DECAY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_DECAY (SEQ_DECAY,TITLE,CODE_TYP,REG_ID,REG_DT,RECODE_ST,DECA_TYP, YEAR, CREATE_DT, NOTI_DT,EXEC_CNT) VALUES(#seq#, #title#, #sel_typ#, #reg_id#, sysdate, 'A', #deca_typ#, #year#, #create_dt#, #noti_dt#, #exec_cnt#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_DECAY SET TITLE = #title#, CODE_TYP = #sel_typ#, YEAR = #year#, CREATE_DT = #create_dt#, NOTI_DT = #noti_dt#, EXEC_CNT = #exec_cnt#, UPD_ID=#reg_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE SEQ_DECAY = #seq#
sqlMap.insert: insert into T_FILE (TABLE_SEQ ,TABC_TYP, FILE_DIR,ORG_FILE_NM ,FILE_SIZE ,SEQ_FILE, REG_ID, REG_DT, RECODE_ST, FILE_NM) VALUES(#seq# ,'DE', #file_dir_nm# ,#file_org_nm# ,#file_size# ,SEQ_FILE.nextval, #reg_id#, sysdate, 'A', #file_name#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_FILE SET RECODE_ST = 'D', UPD_ID=#reg_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE TABLE_SEQ = #seq# AND TABC_TYP='DE' AND RECODE_ST='A'
UPDATE T_DECAY SET RECODE_ST = 'D' WHERE SEQ_DECAY = #seq#
